users.name: Miranda Pablo Agustin
users.description: Amante de Magic: The Gathering, siempre en busca de nuevos mazos y estrategias. Mi color favorito de maná es [Inserta tu color aquí] y disfruto jugando con [tu tipo de mazo o comandante favorito]. ¡Vamos a jugar y compartir ideas sobre este increíble juego!

favCards.name: Hour of Reckoning
favCards.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
favCards.flavor_text:
"Synths are crawling all over the place! Thin them out before we drop!"
—Proctor Ingram

users.name: Agustin Miranda
users.description: Amantes de las Cartas de angeles con intencionde explorar el munfo de Magic a la espera de nuevas experiencias en mis mazos. Busco ser el mejor...

users.name: Belen Chenal
users.description: Amante de Magic: The Gathering, siempre en busca de nuevos mazos y estrategias. Mi color favorito de maná es [Inserta tu color aquí] y disfruto jugando con [tu tipo de mazo o comandante favorito]. ¡Vamos a jugar y compartir ideas sobre este increíble juego!

users.name: Joaquin Ortiz
users.description: Amante de Magic: The Gathering, siempre en busca de nuevos mazos y estrategias. Mi color favorito de maná es [Inserta tu color aquí] y disfruto jugando con [tu tipo de mazo o comandante favorito]. ¡Vamos a jugar y compartir ideas sobre este increíble juego!

favCards.name: Sword of Feast and Famine

users.name: Matias Latorre
users.description: Amante de Magic: The Gathering, siempre en busca de nuevos mazos y estrategias. Mi color favorito de maná es [Inserta tu color aquí] y disfruto jugando con [tu tipo de mazo o comandante favorito]. ¡Vamos a jugar y compartir ideas sobre este increíble juego!

favCards.name: Phantasmal Dragon
favCards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
favCards.flavor_text: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

favCards.name: Hypersonic Dragon
favCards.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)
favCards.flavor_text:
"Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive."
—Niv-Mizzet

favCards.name: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God
favCards.oracle_text:
Nicol Bolas has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield.
+1: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control.
−3: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
−8: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.

favCards.name: Wee Dragonauts
favCards.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
favCards.flavor_text:
"Something's causing electrospheric disruption in the blazekite's spire-vanes. Find the cause, and tell them to keep it up!"
—Juzba, Izzet tinker

users.name: latorre
users.description: Amante de Magic: The Gathering, siempre en busca de nuevos mazos y estrategias. Mi color favorito de maná es [Inserta tu color aquí] y disfruto jugando con [tu tipo de mazo o comandante favorito]. ¡Vamos a jugar y compartir ideas sobre este increíble juego!

decks.creator: Beuwu
decks.name: Ratas Agropecuarias
decks.description: Mazo especializado para controlar los mazos agros, invocamos ratitas cosineras que nos daran el sustento para poder aguantar,

cards.name: Blightbelly Rat
cards.oracle_text:
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)
When this creature dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Carrion Rats
cards.oracle_text: Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, any player may exile a card from their graveyard. If a player does, this creature assigns no combat damage this turn.
cards.flavor_text:
"Just what I need—more competition."
—Cabal grave robber

cards.name: Burglar Rat
cards.oracle_text: When this creature enters, each opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor_text:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni

cards.name: Blood Operative
cards.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When this creature enters, you may exile target card from a graveyard.
Whenever you surveil, if this card is in your graveyard, you may pay 3 life. If you do, return this card to your hand.

cards.name: Crypt Rats
cards.oracle_text: {X}: This creature deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.
cards.flavor_text:
"Shoo, you little worm tails—go away! My corpses aren't your dinner!"
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

decks.creator: Papitas
decks.name: Angel Guards
decks.description: Mazo agro de angeles preparados para purificar a los desalmados y ratitas cocineras...

cards.name: Admonition Angel
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may exile target nonland permanent other than this creature.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

cards.name: Angelic Arbiter
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures.
Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

cards.name: Angelic Curator
cards.oracle_text: Flying, protection from artifacts
cards.flavor_text:
"Do not treat your people as you treat your artifacts. Let them go, and they will live; seal them here, and they will die."
—Urza, to Radiant

cards.name: Angel of Fury
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Angel of Finality
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, exile target player's graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: "Better the dead depart utterly than be enslaved."

cards.name: Angel of Despair
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, destroy target permanent.
cards.flavor_text:
"I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void."
—Razia, Boros archangel

cards.name: Angel of Condemnation
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
{2}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
{2}{W}, {T}, Exert this creature: Exile another target creature until this creature leaves the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Angelic Wall
cards.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
cards.flavor_text:
"The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."
—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

cards.name: Akki Lavarunner // Tok-Tok, Volcano Born
cards.type_line: Creature — Goblin Warrior // Legendary Creature — Goblin Shaman

card_faces.name: Akki Lavarunner
card_faces.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, flip it.

card_faces.name: Tok-Tok, Volcano Born
card_faces.oracle_text:
Protection from red
If a red source would deal damage to a player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that player instead.

cards.name: An Offer You Can't Refuse
cards.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller creates two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor_text: "I think you'll find my terms quite agreeable, if you know what's good for you."

cards.name: Arcane Endeavor
cards.oracle_text: Roll two d8 and choose one result. Draw cards equal to that result. Then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the other result from your hand without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor_text: Late at night, when dreams touch a studious mind, bouts of inspiration strike.

cards.name: Arcane Infusion
cards.oracle_text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Flashback {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Arcane Flight
cards.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.
cards.flavor_text: The Tolarian Academies are known for their magical research, powerful sorcerers, and accidental destruction of ecosystems.

decks.creator: Matt
decks.name: Frezzer
decks.description:
El mejor de furro de dragones que exitan, perdon existen.
Monti se la come

cards.name: Phantasmal Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
cards.flavor_text: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

cards.name: Artificer's Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Artifact creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Unearth {3}{R}{R} ({3}{R}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Blue Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Lightning Breath — When this creature enters, until your next turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-0, up to one other target creature gets -2/-0, and up to one other target creature gets -1/-0.

cards.name: Archive Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
When this creature enters, scry 2.
cards.flavor_text: "Fascinating. It says here that dragons cannot read."

cards.name: Day of the Dragons
cards.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile all creatures you control. Then create that many 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.
When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all Dragons you control. Then return the exiled cards to the battlefield under your control.

decks.creator: Matt
decks.name: Goblin mamados
decks.description: Mazo enfocado en goblins exitadores de palotes

cards.name: _____ Goblin
cards.oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may put a name sticker on it. Add {R} for each unique vowel on that sticker. (The vowels are A, E, I, O, U, and Y.)
cards.flavor_text: The Astrotorium has never been a place for self-restraint.

comments.comment: Este mazo es espelunantemente bueno! No podemos contra tantas ratitas cocineras
Super recomendado para gente que recien empieza!
No me gusta mucho tu mazo proque esta lleno de ratitas que solo ensucian la cocina, mi mazo de angeles le van a ganar. ajajajajaja rendite!
Este mazo es una pija!!!! c======3
Es como tu mama el mazoo!
Es la puta maquina este mazo!!!!
Es la polla! Pero no tan grande la miaaaa
